name: Transcribe Audio
description: Convert speech to text using OpenAI Whisper API. Supports multiple languages, timestamps, and various output formats. Perfect for transcribing podcasts, meetings, interviews, and any audio content.

audio_source.description: File path or URL to audio file

language.description: ISO-639-1 language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr'). If not specified, language will be auto-detected.

prompt.description: Optional context to improve transcription accuracy. Can include specific terminology, names, or context.

temperature.description: Sampling temperature (0-1). Higher values make output more random.
